TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RsaSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

Docs.summary: Represents a security token that is based upon key that is created using the RSA algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Typically, application developers do not need to use the RsaSecurityToken class, unless a Web service must get the RSA algorithm that is associated with the security token. To get the RSA algorithm, get the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Rsa%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.RSA rsa) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Rsa%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified RSA algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor generates a unique identifier for the security token and sets that to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Id%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.RSA rsa, string id) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Rsa%2A> property.
A unique identifier of the security token. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified RSA algorithm and unique identifier.

Docs.summary: Allows the to free resources before it is destroyed by the garbage collector.
Gets a unique identifier of the security token.
Docs.value: A unique identifier of the security token.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool MatchesKeyIdentifierClause(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause) cil managed

Docs.param: A to compare to this instance.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance matches the specified key identifier.
Docs.returns: if is of type and the keys match; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key.
Docs.value: A that represents a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key.

Docs.summary: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The collection contains an asymmetric key that is created using the RSA algorithm. The key is of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityKey>.

Docs.summary: Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ValidFrom property is set to the instant in time when the security token is created in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

Docs.summary: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> security token never expires.
